scripts.prebuild: npm run css && npm run fonts:check
scripts.fonts:check: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const files=['soehne-web-buch.woff2','soehne-web-kraftig.woff2','soehne-web-halbfett.woff2']; const dir=path.join(__dirname,'public','fonts'); let missing=false; files.forEach(f=>{if(!fs.existsSync(path.join(dir,f))){console.log('\x1b[31m⚠️ Font file missing: '+f+'\x1b[0m');missing=true;}}); if(missing){console.log('\x1b[33m⚠️ Some required font files are missing. Please run: npm run fonts:convert\x1b[0m');}else{console.log('\x1b[32m✅ All font files present\x1b[0m');}"
